overview_of_class: The emphasis in this course is on theory and proofs. It is designed to prepare students to take 300-level mathematics courses such as 321 and 331 as sophomores. Linear algebra, similar to 240, but in greater depth. Topics include vectors, inner product, systems of linear equations, and linear transformations.
name: MENU: Intensive Linear Algebra and Multivariable Calculus
title: WCAS MATH 291-1-61 MENU: Intensive Linear Algebra and Multivariable Calculus

Linear algebra, similar to 240, but in greater depth. Topics include vectors, inner product, systems of linear equations, and linear transformations.
